info: Congratulations to Ms. Pragya Taneja for receiving a travel grant from ICSSR to present her paper titled 'Unveiling the Nexus: Polymorbidity and Healthcare accessibility among pre-elderly population in India' for the Health, Morbidity, and Mortality Working Group Annual Meeting of European Association of Population Studies-2024 at Bilbao, Spain

Congratulations to Mrs. Rishika Tomar for receiving a travel grant from ICSSR to present her paper titled  presented ‘Investigating the Gender Gap in Healthcare Expenses for Non-communicable Diseases in Indian Households’ at the 96th International Atlantic Economic Conference in Philadelphia, U.S.A., 2023.
Congratulations to Mrs. Shruti Shuvam for successfully defending her PhD titled 'Essays on Interlinkages among Women Informal Entrepreneurs, Empowerment and Social Capital.'
